resources.string: Everyting OK! Push the button again to save it.
Not possible to get images. Probably not supported device.

Version 1.5
 - Wifi is connected when needed
 - Progress bar of uploads added
 
 Version 1.4
 - Fix - solving OutOfMemoryException when upload starts by settings Chunksize = 1MB
 - More logging points if logger is enabled
 
 Version 1.3
 - Fix - app crashes during the start
 
 Version 1.2
 - User can choose if application will log activities in the Settings windows. Log file is saved to the sdcard to file SYNOUPLD.LOG
 - Small refactoring
 
 Version 1.1
 - IP port added for users who don't use standard ports (http - 5000, https - 5001). Please add your port at Settings
 - User can choose if successfully uploaded photos wil be deleted or not
 - HTTPS support added
 
 Version 1.0
 - Initial release
